name: Psychic Disturbances
description: Something terrible happened here, something that still echoes through its dark, cavernous halls. You can feel it, simply by standing within these cursed walls. All Resolve rolls are considered Demanding (-5).

name: Toxic Atmosphere
description: Not only is the atmosphere unbreathable to humans (as usual), but it’s also corrosive when in direct contact with skin. All characters not wearing a Level B hazmat or better suffer D20 damage every round.

name: Collapsing
description: Something worse than the simple passage of time has caused this Site to begin slowly falling apart. Each Time Track reset, a random character must pass a DEX check or take 3D10 damage as they are struck by falling debris.

name: Overrun
description: There’s nothing but hungry shadows with vicious teeth here. Each Time Track reset, the crew is ambushed by a random Known Threat.

name: Lockdown
description: The Site’s security systems are still operational and have identified the crew as intruders. Each Time Track reset, a random character triggers a trap and must pass a DEX check or take 3D10 damage.

name: Extreme Temperature
description: Either incredibly hot or cold. All characters not wearing a Level B hazmat or better suffer D10 damage every round.

name: Distorted
description: The laws of physics don’t seem to work properly here. Each Time Track reset, a random character must pass a DEX check or be teleported to a random Area within the Site.

name: Vertical
description: The Site is built vertically, either upwards or downwards. Each Time Track reset, a random character must pass a DEX check or fall, taking 3D10 damage.
